name: Future Fantasy
description:
IF THE EMBEDDED DOWNLOAD ABOVE IS BEING WONKY, YOU CAN PLAY IT VIA THIS URL INSTEAD.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/37043775/Futur...

I decided after feeling demotivated to work on something brand new and silly, so that's where this comes from.

Future Fantasy is actually the name I had for an old one of my tabletop games, but now it's meaning is what it sounds, the fantastical future of me and my best friends.

It's the future I fantasize about, one where all my hopes and dreams come true, hah.

It's actually not too far off.

There's no combat yet, it's ready to go, just I didn't get that far, sorry. :0
